response.overview: Kaathoram Vandugalin Ringaaram is a pyschological comedy where Dr. Anand meets Vinod, a patient who insists he hears bugs buzzing near his ear. What begins as a bizarre case soon unfolds into a heartwarming tale of love, friendship, and family...tested by a problem no one else can hear!
response.tagline: Buzzing of the bugs...Near My Ear.
response.title: Kaathoram Vandugalin Ringaaram
